Package manito.eft.interfaces

Interface DelegatedDisplay

  • public interface DelegatedDisplay
    Methods to implement an alternate display for DeviceProxy opertor interaction.

    Version:
    $Revision: 1032905 $ $Date: 2021-08-25 14:07:55 +0000 (Wed, 25 Aug 2021) $ $Author: abikhan $
    Author:
    nigel.parish
